text: @realDonaldTrump Who cares! Who even listens 2 your political rallies disguised as Coronavirus updates? You’re looking for TV time - that’s all. Where were U and your staff before this? We had NO PRESS CONFS. Just proves - you’re a fool and phony! When it goes bad - U will be gone from the mike.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
